properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Indro ny Tompo Jesosy, jereo
Tena nihafy tokoa !
He ! Nivesatra eso, jereo.
Mba hamonjena anao.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
:
Indro, Jeso, jereo, (Jeso)
Indro, Jeso, jereo, (Jeso)
Izy izao dia mihevitra anao,
Indro, Jeso, jereo.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Indro ny Tompo Jesosy jereo
Efa voahombo tokoa !
He ! fa nijaly tsy meloka teo,
Mba hamonjeny anao.
Indro, Jeso, jereo, sns.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Indro ny lefo-mandoza, jereo,
Nenti-namely ny Tompo !
He ! fa ny rany nirotsaka teo,
Mba hamonjeny anao
Indro, Jeso, jereo, sns.
